jedi:MeditationPower.NAME: Meditation
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFocus and remove your rightmost #yOrb at the end of your turn.

jedi:FearPower.NAME: Fear
DESCRIPTIONS: Until the start of your next turn, whenever a card is created, gain #b%d #yStrength.

jedi:upgradeondraw.NAME: Better
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card this round, #yupgrade it.

jedi:PoisonIvyPower.NAME: Poison Ivy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack a #yPoisoned enemy with a non #yShiv card, add #b

jedi:MakeshiftSwordPower.NAME: Makeshift Sword
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

jedi:FirewallPower.NAME: Firewall
DESCRIPTIONS: When a #yStatus card is created, #yExhaust it.

jedi:MonsterVigorPower.NAME: Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals #b%d more damage with its next attack.
